Castleton, Ontario

Castleton, Ontario Castleton, Ontario, is in Cramahe Township, Northumberland County. The first of "our" McKagues from County Cavan (Ireland) settled near here. As you can see, things haven't changed a lot over the years. The General Store is still the place to hear all the news and pick up the mail and it still looks the way it did at the turn of the (last) century--as do many of the other buildings shown in the pictures. The Town Hall is where we held the August 1999 reunion. A number of the family still live in the area. Please let us know if you can add to our collection of Castleton pictures. For a closer view of any picture, click the thumbnail. Then click the "back" button on your browser to return to this page.
